metadata.description: Abstract items for relative effort comparison exercise

items.name: A mountain
items.explanation: Practically impossible to move - would require extraordinary resources and geological-scale intervention.

items.name: A pebble
items.description: Small stone, fits in your palm
items.explanation: Requires deliberate action but minimal physical effort - easily picked up and moved by hand.

items.name: A grain of sand
items.explanation: Minimal effort required - can be moved with a gentle breath or touch.

items.name: A boulder
items.explanation: Substantial effort required - needs tools, multiple people, or machinery to move effectively.
